articles.title: Zazzaroni on the referee class: "Poor, they are simply poor"

articles.title: Serie A, the updated standings: Bologna keeps their European hopes alive
articles.summary: With the second victory in two consecutive weekends, something that had been missing for a while, Bologna gained three points which allowed them to overtake Lazio and Sassuolo and move into eighth position.

articles.title: Bologna finds their second victory in a row: a penalty is enough to overcome Udinese
articles.summary: After a dark period, Bologna won again, the second in a row in the league and the third if we also consider the Europa League.

articles.title: Insults to the referee for decisions against Napoli, his wife misunderstands and stabs him
articles.summary: Blood, a knife stuck in the wall and a man rushed to hospital: scenes that should have nothing to do with football, but which occurred in a couple's living room after Atalanta-Napoli.
